subject: Order information
description_text:
Hi,

I just received my order, my order number is SSN5716. I ordered the VAM Pro
haptic reactor kit as part of my order alongside the pedals, but I have
only received my pedals so far. Will the haptics kit arrive in a different
package? As the tracking for the shipping says everything is delivered.

Is there a way to understand when they might arrive?

Thanks,
Miral

conversations.body_text: Hi Miral Desai,       We apologize for the inconvenience. Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We have arranged for your shipment and it is currently in transit. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224805448
Hi Miral Desai,  â€‹  Your shipment is expected to arrive around the 20th.
